fields.title: ABOUT
fields.content:
About

GONE ARE THE DAYS OF A HUNDRED THUMBNAILS PER PAGE, REPLACED INSTEAD BY A SIMPLE SOCIAL RECOMMENDATION INTERFACE.

      
Be a part of every twist and turn as Stunable navigates the ups and downs of the startup world, keeping you updated with news of its daily debacles and unconventional victories.








<-- LINK TO MEDIA KIT

STUNABLE is a clothing aggregator and social shopping platform that introduces unique shoppers to unique products, empowering fashion-focused individuals to realize their full potential as trendsetters and tastemakers--to be the most stunning. As an online personal shopper, STUNABLE unites women with distinct products from boutiques, up-and-coming brands, and new designers.

STUNABLE encourages women to express their individual style by introducing them to truly unique clothing. Shopping with STUNABLE means no more searching through hundreds of websites or sorting through every shirt on the rack in the hopes of finding the perfect, unique, item. By incorporating a recommendation system, public sharing platform, and ecommerce capabilities into one social shopping application, STUNABLE is in the business of bringing the overall shopping experience—the "going-to-the-mall-on-a-Friday-afternoon-with-some-friends" sort of shopping experience—a home on the web.

 

Our Roots

The brainchild of Colgate University Alums, Samantha Radocchia, Briehan Moran, and Elizabeth Nolan, STUNABLE was founded as ShopwithStella.com in April of 2011 in a gritty Brooklyn loft. Since then, the founders have been working diligently to keep the dream alive, introducing emerging designers to a national market and improving the overall experience for online shoppers everywhere.


Over the past year, STUNABLE has amassed over 100 partnerships with various designers and boutiques, providing STUNABLE’s shoppers with a host of distinct clothing ranging from a line of yoga wear based out of Manhattan and made entirely from organic materials to a high end formal wear line operating just outside of Sacramento. The Stunable Team canvasses the country in search of exceptionally unique clothing, leaving no rock unturned when it comes to discovering emerging fashion.

The company will continue its bi-coastal presence in the following months, working closely with Simple Union Interactive in San Francisco to develop a mobile application and to spread the word of STUNABLE’s continuing success through a viral marketing campaign. Furthermore, the Stunable Team has recently entered into negotiations with a major television network and is pursuing an exciting opportunity to pioneer new frontiers in the integration of television and technology. The future is bright for STUNABLE -- so get ready to be stunned!

fields.title: CAREERS
fields.content:
Careers

Here at Stunable, we seek to empower every team member to do their best work. We value creative direction and collaboration, but most of all, we’re looking to build a team of talented people who truly believe in Stunable’s mission of bringing social shopping a home on the web. Located in the heart of Manhattan’s West Village, the Stunable.com office is just a step away from the city’s most renowned restaurants, bars, night clubs and theaters and boasts the exclusive shopping experience found on Bleecker Street and in the neighboring Meatpacking District.

 

Send a resume and a cover letter to jobs@Stunable.com if you want to join the Stunable team. Available positions include:

Software Engineer

  • We look for engineers with the ability to curate creative solutions to a variety of technical challenges. As an engineer, you will have a huge impact on how we design, build, and deliver our service.
  • Familiarity with working across the software stack is preferred. Our current technologies include: Django, Python and MySQL. Beta will be launched on Amazon EC2 using Ubuntu and Ngnix. The current codebase has been architected for a future No-SQL solution; MongoDB or possibly Amazon Dynamo.
  • The RESTful Stunable API is cutting edge and works directly with our web application code and with all other API technologies. It is helpful to be familiar with OAuth, Basic/Digest, Custom Auth, JSON, YAML, Pickle, XML, HATEOAS, Proper HTTP Status Code, form validation, throttling, streaming.
  • Candidates must like dogs

iOS Engineer

  • We think of iOS as a core platform at Stunable. You will work closely with a team of experienced engineers and product designers to bring Stunable to the iPhone and iPad.
  • Requires iOS experience and a strong understanding of touch and gestural interfaces
  • Night owls preferred
  • When applying, please include links to applications you have built

Front-end Engineer

  • Aesthetics are of the essence at Stunable.com. We’re looking to hire creative engineers who push the boundaries of design to create the most visually interactive application possible.
  • Must be proficient in HTML, CSS and Javascript
  • Attention to detail is a must and the ability to communicate ideas and work collaboratively is essential to this position
  • When applying, please include a link to your portfolio

Account Executive

  • Stunable.com is in the business of bringing emerging designers, up-and-coming brands and boutiques a national customer base on the web. We’re looking for candidates who are excited about discovering new trends and aren’t afraid to take the initiative in forging and establishing new partnerships and spreading the word about Stunable.
  • College degree is required and strong communication and interpersonal skills are a must
  • Experience with online sales, advertising, and social media are beneficial
  • Work hours may vary and may include travel- flexibility is preferred

Merchant Risk Agent

  • As a Merchant Risk Agent at Shop with Stunable your role is to provide insights into merchant loss drivers and recommendations for their management. We are seeking someone to:
  • Identify and monitor the key drivers of merchandise problems and deliver recommendations for driving down these problems
  • Conduct quantitative analyses of Stunable's merchants and their businesses to gain knowledge and improve products & policies
  • Develop best practices for our merchant Community in inventory management, shipping practices, return policies, fraud reduction and dispute management
  • Evaluate high-risk transactions for potential fraud; research past activity; collect information from online and offline sources, and directly from customers
  • Vet new and existing sellers for credit risk; identify unusual system-wide activity including collusion fraud and potential money laundering
  • Conduct investigations and collect information from a wide variety of sources including open sources, databases, and banks
  • Participate in criminal investigations as needed
  • Ideally you have at least a Bachelor’s degree and proficiency in ecommerce finance, payments and merchant segmentation

fields.title: FAQ
fields.content:
FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

1. What is STUNABLE?

STUNABLE is your online personal shopper. Everyone here at Stunable.com works night and day, leaving no rock unturned in the pursuit of discovering never-before-seen fashion. We pull unique products from emerging products, up-and-coming designers and boutiques and put them all in one place: Stunable.com. We then sort through this huge collection of clothing, providing you with personalized recommendations based on your style and preferences.

2. What is a Stunner?

Here at STUNABLE, we believe every woman has her own distinct style. That's why we call everyone that shops with STUNABLE a STUNNER.

3. How do I find other stunners?

You can invite friends to become stunners on STUNABLE by providing their email addresses in the modal appearing when "Invite Stunners" is clicked. You can search for stunners already using STUNABLE by entering their first or last name into the search bar on the left side of the screen. If you choose to login to STUNABLE with your Facebook account, your Facebook friends will become accessible as stunners and may appear in the "Happenings" column on the left side of the screen.

4. How do I share clothes with other stunners?

You can share clothes with other stunners by dragging the items you like to the names on the left side of the screen. Once you drag a product to a friend, choose to add a note, or just send it along. You can also send entire racks within your closet to stunners by dragging that rack to the stunner's name. If you don't see the name of the person to whom you're trying to send a trend, simply type their first or last name in the search bar above the "Happenings" column and your stunners will begin to automatically appear in the column as you type their name.

5. What is a closet?

Your closet is your fashion profile. Adding clothing to your closet allows you easily bookmark items from a variety of sources without having to navigate to each individual website or compile a scattered list of things you may have liked, but will later fail to remember. You can add clothes to your closet by dragging the items you like from the carousel to the closet and racks on the left side of the screen. You can also add an item of clothing directly to your closet by clicking the hanger icon underneath the picture of that item.

6. Who can see my closet?

The items and racks within your closet are viewable by other stunners. You can view the clothes and racks within your fellow stunner's closets by clicking on their picture. You can add and purchase the clothes another stunner has saved to their closet by dragging the item to your closet. Feel free to borrow or steal the clothes you like most!

7. What is a rack?

A rack is a category of related clothing. You can add new racks, delete racks and name the racks you have created. For example, you might want to create a rack named “workout wear” and add athletic t-shirts and several pairs of yoga pants to it. Or perhaps you want to make a “Friday night out” rack, adding the dresses and tops you are thinking about wearing to a party next weekend. You add clothes to a rack by dragging that particular item to the rack on the left hand side of the screen.

8. If add clothes to a rack why do they appear in my closet as well?

Similar to the library and playlists found within iTunes, if you add an item to a particular rack, it will automatically be added to your closet. On the other hand, if you click the hanger or drag an item to the closet, it will be added to the closet, but will not appear on any particular rack. Think of it this way: the closet is for collecting, racks are for organizing.

9. Is there a difference between racks I create and the Recently Added, Purchased and Sale racks?

Yes. While you can add, delete and name racks you create, the purchased, sale, and recently added racks are default racks that can't be deleted. The recently added and purchased racks are there to remind you of the latest clothes to have been added by you to your closet or purchased on the site. The sale rack will notify you when any of the clothes in your closet go on sale! You can purchase entire racks by clicking the "Buy" icon next to the name of the rack and share racks with others by dragging the rack to the name of a trendsetter- it's all up to you.

10. How can I improve my recommendations?

The more time you spend shopping with Stunable, the more we will get to know your style. Our recommendations improve every time you click the thumbs up and thumbs down icons, letting her know which clothes fit your taste.

11. What happens when I click the Stunable hanger icon?

The STUNABLE hanger icon is located underneath a particular item of clothing, whether the item is in the recommendation carousel or in a product modal. Clicking the hanger will simply add that article of clothing to your closet.

12. What shipping options do you offer?

Shipping and handling options are determined by each individual Stunable Stylist and will be displayed during the check out process. Stylists must ship products within 7 days of their purchase, but the varying shipping policies may extend the period between the purchase and delivery of your product. Expected transit times for the most common shipping methods are listed below unless otherwise noted in the seller's policies.
  • Standard U.S.: 4 to 14 business days after shipping (may take up to 21 business days)
  • Expedited U.S.: 2 to 6 business days after shipping
  • Two-Day U.S.: 2 business days after shipping
  • One-Day U.S.: 1 business day after shipping

13. How to do I track my shipment?

Within the Order History page of the Manage Account section, you will see a list of your past orders with their corresponding icon that says "Track". Simply click on the icon, which will re-direct you to a third party shipping and handling website responsible for predicting the delivery of you products.

14. When I track my shipment, it says it has been sent and delivered, but it hasn’t arrived yet. What do I do?

Occasionally a carrier will scan a package as delivered before it arrives at the final destination. When this happens, the package is usually delivered within the next few business days.

If you've waited a couple of days and you still don't have the package:

  • See if someone else accepted delivery 4 to 14 business days after shipping (may take up to 21 business days)
  • Look around the delivery location. Carriers sometimes leave packages in a safe, hidden place like on a side porch, in/around your garage, or behind bushes.
  • Look for a notice of attempted delivery. You may find an attempted delivery notice in your mailbox or P.O. Box or on your door. Follow the instructions on that notice to request redelivery or pick up the package.
  • Contact the carrier. Ask if they have additional information about the package's location. (Have your tracking or delivery confirmation number handy.) If you package was shipped via UPS, they may be able to hold the package at their local hub for you to pick up. You can call UPS and see if this is possible.

Most packages arrive by the estimated delivery date. If you don't receive the package by then, please allow an additional day or two for the package to be delivered. Please note that carriers may deliver packages up until 8 p.m.

15. Do the stylists on STUNABLE ship internationally?

At this time, clothing purchased on Stunable.com cannot be mailed to international locations- our stylists only ship to the continental U.S. As we grow and expand, Stunable.com will begin to handle foreign transactions by implementing a streamlined international shipping policy.

16. Does STUNABLE charge a membership fee?

No, there are no membership fees associated with being a Stunable stunner. You never have to worry about any commitment – browse and buy anytime!

17. Can I change or cancel my order after its been placed?

There are certain instances where an order can be adjusted after it’s been placed. We will do our best to accommodate your request. Please contact our Customer Service department at orders@stunable.com

fields.title: HOW IT WORKS
fields.content:
HOW IT WORKS

Shopping

Shopping with Stunable couldn't be easier. Here's how it works, step-by-step.

Step 1: Sign Up

To begin browsing, bookmarking, and buying, start by creating an account. Creating an account is 100% FREE, safe, and secure. All we need is your email address (so we can send a confirmation after you've made a purchase) or you can choose to login through Facebook. You will use the same email address and password to log in every time you return. That's it!

Step 2: Answer one simple question

Before you start Shopping with Stunable, she will ask you one simple question: "Who makes your favorite pair of jeans?" Answer by entering the brand, retailer, or designer you love most and Stunable will have all she needs to start recommending your favorite styles.

Step 3: Start shopping

After you're signed up, head to the homepage and start shopping. You can select a category of clothing from the tabs or simply view all the products Stunable suggests for you. Stunable will recommend only the clothes that you want to see most, so the complicated process of searching through thousands of products is in her hands! If you see something you like, click the thumbs up to let Stunable know you like what she is sending your way. If something isn't quite you, click the thumbs down and Stunable will be sure to change up her picks. Customize your browsing experience by changing the sliding scale on the upper right-hand corner of the window and view as little as three or as many as twelve products at time. There are lots of ways to browse… it's all up to you!

Step 4: Build your closet

Your closet is your fashion profile. You can add clothes to your closet by dragging the items you like from the carousel to the closet and racks on the left side of the screen. You can also add an item of clothing directly to your closet by clicking the hanger icon underneath the picture of that item. You can view your entire closet by clicking on "your closet" on the left side of the screen. If you want to take a look at your friends' closets, click their name and you will be able to see their entire closet and racks within their closet. Feel free to borrow or steal the clothes you like most!

Step 5: Organize your closet with racks

The closet allows you to collect the clothes you like and organize that clothing by creating racks. A rack is a collection of clothing with a common theme chosen by you. You can add new racks, delete racks, and name the racks you have created. For example, you might want to create a rack named "workout wear" and add athletic t-shirts and several pairs of yoga pants to it. Or perhaps you want to make a "Friday night out" rack, adding the dresses and tops you are thinking about wearing to a party next weekend.

You add clothes to a rack by dragging that particular item to the rack on the left hand side of the screen. Similar to the music library and playlists in iTunes, if you add an item to a particular rack, it will automatically be added to your closet. On the other hand, if you click the hanger or drag an item to the closet, it will be added to the closet, but will not appear on any particular rack. Think of it this way: the closet is for collecting, racks are for organizing.

While you can add, delete, and name racks you create, the purchased, sale, and recently added racks are default racks that can't be deleted. The recently added and purchased racks are there to remind you of the latest items to have been added by you to your closet or purchased on the site. The sale rack will notify you when any item added to your closet goes on sale! You can purchase entire racks and share racks with others—it's all up to you.

Step 6: Share your style

Here at Stunable, we believe every woman has her own distinct style. That's why we call everyone who Shops with Stella a trendsetter. You can share clothes with other trendsetters by dragging the items you like to the names on the right side of the screen. Find other trendsetters by entering their names in the search bar or simply view your top trendsetters in the "happenings" section. Once you drag a product to a friend, choose to add a note, or just send it along.

Step 7: Wear it

If you want to purchase an item, add it to your cart. You can add items to your cart from Stunable's recommendations, your closet, the product descriptions, and even from other trendsetters' closets. Click buy and our secure checkout will help you quickly add some new clothes to your real closet!

Become a Stunable Stylist

How Selling with Stunable works

The first thing you need to know is that unlike just about every other site out there, we do not charge any fees for creating boutiques (as many as you want!) uploading photos (as many as you want!) or for any of the other features and options that we offer to help you customize your boutique and make it your own. Selling on Stunable.com is 100% FREE until you make a sale, at which point we charge a flat 20% fee. It's that simple ... we only make money when you do!

If you are an emerging brand, designer, retailer, or boutique and want to be featured on Stunable.com, click on the "Become a Stunable Stylist" link on the homepage and submit your information to Stunable's team. A sales representative will be in contact with you within 2-3 days in order to discuss integration options.

The Science Behind Stunable

Stunable.com is a web application offering women the opportunity to shop—quite literally—with Stunable, providing users with an interactive platform for browsing clothing online. Features include clothing recommendation, customized book marking, and sharing with friends.

In its most basic capacity, Stunable.com is a virtual mall. The application aggregates the clothing of new designers, upcoming brands, boutiques, and small retailers, enabling online shoppers to browse and purchase a wide variety of items on a single user-friendly platform: Stunable.com. The indispensible service of compiling a database of products from diverse clothing vendors is complimented by the application's recommendation system, which is disguised as a persona known as Stella.

Stunable: The Recommendation Engine

Upon entering the site, the shopper's attention is immediately focused on the clothing displayed in Stunable's recommendation carousel. With its fluid content and ability to scale the size and number of viewable products, the clothing within the carousel are recommendations from Stunable tailored to the personal style of that particular shopper. Stunable's recommendations are created for each user based on her likes, dislikes, browsing history, purchases, and an ongoing list of user defined questions. The machine-learning algorithm behind the recommender system uses both collaborative filtering and metric space to create predictive recommendations. Scores are calculated using Pearson Correlation and filtering is applied to remove items contrary to a user's preferences, buying history and personal questions.

Product Inventory and Stunable Sync

Stunable.com's inventory is maintained systematically via Partner Application Programming Interfaces (APIs); or rather what we have dubbed, "Stunable Sync." Partner APIs communicate directly with the Stunable API, sending product data and images in near real time. "Stunable Sync" also keeps products in near real time sync by using a custom web crawling framework. This framework enables smaller partner organizations without an API to send product data to Stunable. These two fully automated services enable Stunable to act as an all-inclusive online storefront where vast range of products are displayed, shared, and sold.

Stunable API

The RESTful Stunable API is on the cutting edge of recent developments in technology and works directly with Stunable's web application code and other API technologies. The API is a key asset to the business, enabling data to be pushed, pulled and updated with other companies and mobile web services. This allows Stunable to both maintain and sell third party inventories while simultaneously updating the master database with recommendation information.

fields.title: PRIVACY
fields.content:
Privacy Policy

Your privacy is very important to us. Our Privacy Policy spells out Stunable's commitment to respecting the privacy of the members and visitors to the site. We reserve the right to change this policy, which will occur either through online posting or an notification to a provided email address.

We are very careful with your information. Collection of information is usually grouped into two categories: personal, which is information identifiable to a specific member, and aggregate, which is general demographic information that does not identify any individual member. Personal information may include your name, email address, mailing address, credit card information and phone number. Stunable.com collects personal information when you create an account, enter or sign up to receive email and/or place an order. We may also collect certain demographic information such as your genre preferences, age, gender, geographical location, language, time zone, income and education (some of the information we ask for may be optional). Stunable uses this information for the following general purposes:

  • customize the content you see
  • fulfill your requests for products and services
  • improve our services
  • help make this site easier for you to use by not having to enter information more than once
  • contact you
  • and conduct research

We will not disclose your personally identifiable information to third parties for their marketing purposes without your consent.

As is true of most web sites, this site automatically recognizes the Internet URL from which you access this site. We may also log your Internet protocol ("IP") address, Internet service provider, and date/time stamp for system administration, order verification, internal marketing, and system troubleshooting purposes.

We respect children's privacy. We do not knowingly or intentionally collect personal information from children under age 13. Elsewhere on this site, you have represented and warranted that you are either 18 years of age or using the site with the supervision of a parent or guardian. If you are under the age of 13, please do not submit any personal information to us, and rely on a parent or guardian to assist you.

This privacy policy applies only to this site. We are not responsible for the content or privacy practices on any non-Stunable site to which this site links or that links to this site. By visiting our site, you accept the practices described in this Privacy Policy and in Stunable's Terms and Conditions.

If you have questions or suggestions, please contact us at support@stunable.com.

fields.title: Return Policy
fields.content:
Returns

Return Policy

STUNABLE gives its stylists the option to either conduct returns in accordance with the STUNABLE Standard Return Policy or elect to refuse to accept returns. If a stylist does not accept returns, the NO RETURNS policy will be clearly marked in both the checkout process as well as on that particular stylist's information page.

Making a Return

Making a return is easy on Stunable.com. Connect with the stylist from whom you purchased the item by following these simple steps.

Step 1: Within fourteen days of purchasing the product, locate the item you wish to return within Your Order History

Step 2: Simply click the icon marked "return item" next to the article of clothing you wish to return. A submission form with the item of clothing purchased, the order number and contact information of the stylist will appear and may prompt you to input some information. This will generate a notification to the stylist that a return is pending.

Step 3: Mail the item back to the stylist at the address designated within the return submission form. This information can also be found on the stylist's information page.

Step 4: Be sure to include a valid tracking number! In order to receive a refund for returned products, you are responsible to provide an authenticated tracking number to ensure the stylist receives the product you are returning. STUNABLE also recommends you purchase insurance on packages containing items to be returned because stylists are not obligated to refund worn, damaged or altered items.

Step 5: You account will be credited and you will receive an email notification verifying the transaction. It's that simple!

Standard Return Policy

  • Merchandise must be returned within 14 days of purchase.
  • Merchandise must not be worn, altered, or washed.
  • Merchandise must have all tags attached.
  • Footwear must include the original shoe box in its original condition, without postal labels.
  • Shipping and handling charges are not refundable.
  • To be eligible for a refund, shoppers must include a valid tracking number for all products being returned.
  • Stylists are not responsible for accepting damaged or altered products and are not liable for alterations occurring during transit. It's recommended that shipping and handling insurance accompany packages containing items that buyers are seeking to return.
  • Stylists are responsible for responding directly to buyers within a timely manner and are obligated to process returns and refunds within seven [7] days upon receipt of the returned items.
  • Stylists will notify STUNABLE that a refund is being issued and STUNABLE will process the transaction by crediting the buyer's account and notifying the buyer of the refund via email notification.

fields.title: Team
fields.content:
The Stunable Team

Samantha Radocchia, Co-Founder and Chief Executive Officer

Samantha graduated from Colgate University Magna Cum Laude with a B.A. in English Literature and Sociology -- specializing in Critical Theory and Linguistics. She continued her studies at King's College in London where she studied creative approaches to Management and Entrepreneurship as well as at New York University, where she is currently pursuing a Master's degree in Digital Media. Samantha acted as head of social and digital media for a Theatre for a New Audience in New York, NY where her responsibilities included the creation of a digital marketing campaign. In 2010, Samantha embarked upon independent research on Apple, Inc., which culminated in her Master's thesis. Sam has found a home for the practical application of her studies in the development of Stunable.com, which reflects an appreciation for aesthetics and the importance of the user experience. Proficient in HTML and CSS, Samantha participates in the development and maintenance of Stunable.com, working closely with the programming team at Simple Union Interactive in San Francisco. Samantha is an avid risk-taker and resident daredevil, attaining her pilot's license at the age of 17 and accumulating over 700 jumps as a competitive skydiver.

What prompted you to found STUNABLE?
I would probably get fired if I weren't my own boss.
You have 10 minutes to give a speech at a high school. What is your message? Your parents know you better than you think. So cut the BS and be good to them!
No one knows that I…
Have accumulated over 700 jumps as a competitive skydiver and also have my pilot's license- just some minor details.
Any tattoos?
Too many.
What is your favorite Dr. Suess book?
The Sneetches

Briehan Moran, Co-Founder and Chief Marketing Officer

Briehan Moran is the director STUNABLE's social media campaign, public relations, and marketing efforts. After graduating Cum Laude from Colgate University with a B.A. in Political Science, Briehan enrolled in Seton Hall Law School to pursue a J.D. During her studies, Briehan became interested in intellectual property and wrote an influential article on data mining and the future of the Internet. As per the startup industry standard of everyone doing a little bit of everything, Briehan doubles as both the point person responsible for overseeing the company's legal team and as the liaison to STUNABLE's brand management company. Her work for Vice Presidential Nominee Paul Ryan of Wisconsin as well her federal judicial clerkship with the Honorable Claire C. Cecchi, has trained Briehan in the art of public presentation. In addition to drafting many of STUNABLE's agreements, she manages the company's social media campaign and publicity and works closely in implementing the company's marketing campaign.

Where did you grow up?
A really small town by the beach
What prompted you found to STUNABLE?
My first day of law school.
Favorite movie?
Christmas Vacation
Favorite fictional character?
Jack Donaghy. Remember, the back-flip is 90% confidence.

Elizabeth Nolan, Co-Founder and Chief Business Development Officer

Elizabeth Nolan is STUNABLE's in-house "fashion expert" and head of sales, retailer acquisitions, and brand integration. She graduated from Colgate University in 2010 with a B.A. in English Language and Literature and spent a semester abroad studying at the London School of Economics. Having worked at BVLGARI, Burberry Ltd., and most recently, as an assistant merchandiser for Ralph Lauren, Lizzy brings her invaluable experience in the cut-throat Manhattan fashion industry to STUNABLE. While at BVLGARI and Burberry, Lizzy was responsible for designing and organizing seasonal marketing campaigns to increase sales of three perfume lines in major department stores, monitoring sales of competing perfume brands, and presenting effective pricing strategies to the marketing team. Lizzy's experience lends itself to her work at STUNABLE, where she manages a sales team responsible for acquiring partnerships with up and coming designers as well as overseeing the product integration process and monitoring sales and customer service.

Ohh great. Your apartment is burning down! What two things do you grab?
Half of my wardrobe in one arm and the second half in my other arm. That counts as two, right?
Article of clothing you refuse to throw away but would never wear in public?
Granny panties.
If you had to eat one type of food for the rest of your life what would it be?
Chicken parm. I'm hoping Brie picked either pizza or cheeseburgers so I can mooch off of her.
If you could select one person from history and ask them any question to which he or she would have to give an honest reply, who would you select and what would you ask?
Lee McQueen, founder of Alexander McQueen. Love or success?

Chewbacca "Chewy", Champion Drool-er

Chewy is both the West Village and STUNABLE's resident Newfoundland. Born on a small rural farm in Connecticut, Chewy made his way to the Big Apple where he can be found terrorizing female chocolate labs in the Washington Square Park dog run, posing for photo opportunities with tourists, and eating munchkins outside of various Dunkin Donuts locations. His most notable contributions to STUNABLE include consuming over seventy business cards, applying slobber to nearly every outfit Lizzy Nolan wears and sleeping on his back in the bathtub for several hours at a time.

If you had to eat one type of food for the rest of your life what would it be?
Skittles
No one knows that I…
Can walk myself to Joe's Pizza from any location in Manhattan.
In what way are you similar to Lady GaGa?
I'm a guilty pleasure for most men over the age of 50.
Advisory Board

Damon Ciarelli, Founder of Burled Walnut and Lead Developer at Stunable

Damon not only works as a Web Designer and Information Architect, but also is a Visionary Entrepreneur and Investor -- one that Stunable has been lucky enough to cross paths with. Since fall 2012, Damon has taken the lead for Stunable's technical development, refining the recommendation engine as well as spearheading retailer integration for the Stunable Sync RESTful API. A man of many talents, Damon worked previously in animation and CG.

John Chase, Chief Executive Officer & Founder of Simple Union Interactive

The Founder and CEO of Simple Union Interactive - a software development team based in San Francisco- John has architected software applications for Cerner Corporation, Coors Brewing, FX Networks, McCann Erickson and Pioneer Electronics. John founded a dedicated hosting company, which was sold and rebranded as www.urack.com in 2007. In addition to leading the team responsible for the functionality of Stunable.com, John provides guidance to the Stunable team concerning issues related to platform architecture, software development, and technical strategy.

Morris W. Banks, Legal Council

As a practicing attorney at the law firm of Pullman & Comley, Morris W. Banks is well versed in the areas of corporate law, corporate securities, taxation, mergers and acquisitions and succession planning for closely held businesses. He has counseled numerous emerging and early stage companies and has been involved in more than $100 million of venture capital financings. In addition to steering the Stunable Team through a grueling negotiation process with NBC Universal, Morris has drafted numerous agreements for STUNABLE and has been crucial in aiding the company in its quest for raising capital.

Dave Fletcher, Founding Partner of THE MECHANISM

For nearly two decades, The Mechanism's Founding Partner, Dave Fletcher has explored a wide range of media – including print, video, photography and interactive design, as well as developed brand identity systems, promotional materials, environmental graphics, packaging and publication designs for a global list of clients. Dave provided the Stunable Team with guidance in the company's early stages, providing the front-end HTML design for Stunable.com's functional prototype.

fields.title: TERM AND CONDITIONS
fields.content:
Terms and Conditions

AGREEMENT BETWEEN USER AND STUNABLE, LLC

Stunable.com and its affiliated services are offered to you conditioned on your acceptance without modification of the terms, conditions, and notices contained herein. Your use of the Stunable Web Site constitutes your agreement to all such terms, conditions, and notices. Your use of the Stunable Web Site may also be subject to additional terms outlined elsewhere on that website (the "Additional Terms"). The Stunable Web Site may contain additional terms that govern particular features or offers (for example, sweepstakes or chat areas). In the event that any of the terms, conditions, and notices contained herein conflict with the Additional Terms or other terms and guidelines contained within any particular Stunable website, then these terms shall control.

PLEASE READ THE FOLLOWING TERMS OF USE AND DISCLAIMERS CAREFULLY BEFORE USING THIS WEB SITE (this "Site").

By accessing or using this Site, you agree to these terms of use, conditions and all applicable laws. If you do not agree to these terms you may not use this Site.

MODIFICATION OF THESE TERMS OF USE.

Stunable reserves the right to change the terms, conditions, and notices under which the Stunable Web Site is offered, including but not limited any charges associated with the use of the Stunable Web Site. You are responsible for regularly reviewing these terms and conditions.

USE OF SITE. PERSONAL AND NON-COMMERCIAL USE LIMITATION.

Unless otherwise specified, the Stunable Web Site is for your personal and noncommercial use. You may not modify, copy, distribute, transmit, display, perform, reproduce, publish, license, create derivative works from, transfer, or sell any information, software, products or services obtained from the Stunable Web Sites.

You may display and, subject to any expressly stated restrictions or limitations relating to specific material, electronically copy, download and print hard copy portions of the material from the different areas of the Site solely for your own noncommercial use, or to place an order with Stunable or to purchase Stunable products. Any other use of materials on this Site, including but not limited to the modification, reproduction, distribution, republication, display or transmission of the content of this Site, without prior written permission of Stunable is strictly prohibited.

Harassment in any manner or form on the Site, including via e-mail, chat and Stella messaging or by obscene or abusive language is strictly forbidden. Impersonation of others, including a Stunable employee, host, or representative or other members or visitors on the Site is prohibited. You may not upload to, distribute, or otherwise publish through the Site any content which is libelous, defamatory, obscene, threatening, invasive of privacy or publicity rights, abusive, illegal, or otherwise objectionable, or which may constitute or encourage a criminal offense, violate the rights of any party or otherwise give rise to liability or violate any law. You may not upload commercial content on the Site or use the Site to solicit others to join or become members of any other commercial online service or other organization.

COPYRIGHTS AND TRADEMARKS.

The entire content included in this Site, including but not limited to text, design, graphics, interfaces, or code and the selection and arrangements thereof is copyrighted as a collective work under the United States and other copyright laws, and is the property of Stunable.com, LLC. The collective work includes works that are licensed to Stunable. All trademarks, service marks, and trade names (collectively the "Marks") are trademarks or registered trademarks of and are proprietary to Stunable.com,LLC or other respective owners that have granted Stunable the right and license to use such Marks.

NOTICES AND PROCEDURES FOR MAKING CLAIMS OF COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT.

Pursuant to Title 17, United States Code, Section 512(c)(2), notifications of claimed copyright infringement should be sent to the website's designated agent. ALL INQUIRIES NOT RELEVANT TO OR NOT COMPLYING WITH THE FOLLOWING PROCEDURE WILL RECEIVE NO RESPONSE. Stunable respects the intellectual property of others, and we ask our users and visitors to do the same. Stunable will process and investigate notices of alleged infringement and will take appropriate actions under the Digital Millennium Copyright Act ("DMCA") and other applicable intellectual property laws. Upon receipt of notices complying with the DMCA, Stunable will act to remove or disable access to any material found to be infringing or found to be the subject of infringing activity and will act to remove or disable access to any reference or link to material or activity that is found to be infringing. If you believe that your work has been copied in a way that constitutes copyright infringement, please provide Stunable the following information. Please be advised that to be effective, the Notification must include ALL of the following: 1.a physical or electronic signature of the person authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive copyright that is allegedly infringed; 2.a description of the copyrighted work that you claim has been infringed; 3.a description of where the material that you claim is infringing is located on the Site; 4.your address, telephone number, and email address and all other information reasonably sufficient to permit Stunable to contact you; 5.a statement by you that you have a good faith belief that the disputed use is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law; 6.a statement by you, made under penalty of perjury, that the above information in your Notice is accurate and that you are the copyright owner or authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. Notices of claimed copyright infringement should be directed to: IMPORTANT NOTE: THE PRECEDING INFORMATION IS PROVIDED EXCLUSIVELY FOR NOTIFYING Stunable THAT YOUR COPYRIGHTED MATERIAL MAY HAVE BEEN INFRINGED. ALL OTHER INQUIRIES, SUCH AS PRODUCT OR SERVICE RELATED QUESTIONS AND REQUESTS, OR QUESTIONS ON PRIVACY, WILL NOT RECEIVE A RESPONSE THROUGH THIS PROCESS.

TYPOGRAPHICAL ERRORS.

In the event a Stunable product or service is listed at an incorrect price due to typographical error or error in pricing information received from our suppliers, Stunable shall have the right to refuse or cancel any orders placed for product or service listed at the incorrect price. Stunable shall have the right to refuse or cancel any such orders whether or not the order has been confirmed and your credit card charged. If your credit card has already been charged for the purchase and your order is canceled, Stunable shall issue a credit to your credit card account in the amount of the incorrect price.

TERM & TERMINATION.

These terms and conditions are applicable to you upon your accessing the Site and/or completing the registration or shopping process. These terms and conditions, or any of them, may be modified or terminated by Stunable without notice at any time for any reason. The provisions relating to Copyrights and Trademarks, Disclaimer, Claims, Limitation of Liability, Indemnification, Applicable Laws, Arbitration and General, shall survive any termination.

BILLING, PAYMENTS & DISCRETIONARY ADJUSTMENTS

For your convenience, when you make a purchase with Stunable your credit card or debit card information will be saved by our third party payment processor and the saved card will be used for all future charges, which will automatically be made to your saved card unless you inform us online or through customer service. You may be charged local sales tax, if applicable. Purchases are not exempt merely because they are made over the Internet. Most states require purchasers to report all purchases that were not taxed and pay tax on those purchases. The tax may be reported and paid on state individual income tax return or by filing a consumer use tax return. Check your states current tax laws for use tax requirements in your area.

All Site Credits are valid for one (1) year after the date the Site Credit is issued. Site Credits can only be redeemed against the purchase price of the items you have selected to purchase from Stunable. Other charges such as processing fees and taxes, if applicable, are additional and cannot be paid with Site Credits. Your account must be in good standing to be eligible to redeem your Site Credits. You cannot exchange Site Credits for any other form of currency - they have no cash value. Stunable reserves the right to change these Site Credit terms and conditions at our discretion, and may terminate the Site Credits program at any time.

Stunable reserves the right to adjust your account where deemed appropriate in our sole and absolute discretion based on events such as (and by way of example only) our determination that you to have incurred an inconvenience or in the event we determine that you have violated these Terms and Conditions or acted fraudulently.

SHIPPING & HANDLING

Stunable’s shipping rates, methods, and terms are set by individual merchants, not by Stunable.com. This information will appear on your order summary page when you are ready to make your purchase. The risk of loss and title for items purchased by you pass to you upon Stunable's delivery of the order confirmation notification. Stunable will not be held liable for any loss or damage of products purchased on the Site. By using this Site and placing an order with Stunable.com, you agree to release Stunable from any all claims relating to shipping and handling fees, additional insurance and return shipping charges. Any and all disputes or questions arising out of the shipment of items purchased on Stunable should be handled directly with the respective merchant responsible for sending purchased items or with the third party shipping service.

REFUNDS

Stunable facilitates information necessary for returns in accordance with its Return Policy, but does not participate directly in the return process. Under no circumstances will Stunable be held liable for costs incurred by either you or the merchant from whom, a product was purchased in so far as those costs relate to the return of products. This includes the cost of return shipping and handling, insurance and additional packaging costs, fees associating with communicating the return, third party electronic payment processing fees, commissions retained by Stunable from the purchased of a subsequently returned product and any loss in value do to a fluctuation in sale price or product inventory. By placing an order on Stunable.com you agree to abide by Stunable’s Return Policy and release Stunable from any and all claims arising from disputes and costs concerning the return and refund of products.

USER PARTICIPATION.

Stunable does not and cannot review all communications and materials posted to or created by users accessing the Site and is not in any manner responsible for the content of these communications and materials. You acknowledge that by providing you with the ability to view and distribute user generated content on the Site, Stunable is merely acting as a passive conduit for such distribution and is not undertaking any obligation or liability relating to any contents or activities on the Site. However, Stunable reserves the right to block or remove communications or materials that it determines to be (a) abusive, defamatory, or obscene, (b) fraudulent, deceptive, or misleading, (c) in violation of a copyright, trademark or; other intellectual property right of another or (d) violates any law or regulation or (e) offensive or otherwise unacceptable to Stunable at its sole discretion. Stunable will take any of the preceding actions only in the event that it is notified and under no other circumstances. Note that any personally identifiable information you may post or transmit will be treated by Stunable in accordance with Stunable's Privacy Policy. Stunable is not directed to children under the age of 18. The Site does not accept registration by, and we will not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from, anyone under 18. We have taken commercially reasonable steps to restrict use of this Site to those who are at least 18 years old. We do not sell products for purchase by children and all children's products we sell are for purchase by adults only. BY VISITING THE SITE OR REGISTERING FOR MEMBERSHIP, YOU ARE AGREEING THAT YOU ARE AT LEAST 18 YEARS OF AGE AND YOU ARE LEGALLY ABLE TO ENTER INTO A CONTRACT.

USER SUBMISSIONS.

Except for any personally identifiable information we may collect from you under the guidelines established in our Privacy Policy, any material, information or other communication you transmit, upload or post to this Site ("Communications") will be considered non-confidential and non-proprietary. Stunable will have no obligations with respect to the Communications. Stunable and its designees will be free to copy, disclose, distribute, incorporate and otherwise use the Communications and all data, images, sounds, text, and other things embodied therein for any and all commercial or noncommercial purposes.

CLAIMS.

Each claim or statement about the effectiveness of Stunable products and/or each claim or statement comparing the effectiveness of Stunable products to the effectiveness of other products is expressly limited to the United States, unless otherwise disclosed on the Site.

DISCLAIMER.

Stunable makes no warranties or representations about the accuracy or completeness of this Site's content or the content of any site or External Sites.

Stunable does not filter advertisements or other content that children may view through our sites or "hot-linked" sites, and they could receive content and materials from the Internet and/or advertising that are inappropriate for children. We encourage parents and guardians to spend time online with their children and to consider using an electronic filtering software.

THIS SITE AND THE MATERIALS, INFORMATION, SERVICES, AND PRODUCTS IN THIS SITE, INCLUDING, WITHOUT LIMITATION, TEXT, GRAPHICS, AND LINKS, ARE PROVIDED "AS IS" AND WITHOUT WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, WHETHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED. TO THE FULLEST EXTENT PERMISSIBLE PURSUANT TO APPLICABLE LAW, Stunable.com, LLC, DISCLAIMS ALL WARRANTIES, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, NON-INFRINGEMENT, FREEDOM FROM COMPUTER VIRUS, AND WARRANTIES ARISING FROM COURSE OF DEALING OR COURSE OF PERFORMANCE. Stunable DOES NOT REPRESENT OR WARRANT THAT THE FUNCTIONS CONTAINED IN THE SITE WILL BE UNINTERRUPTED OR ERROR-FREE, THAT DEFECTS WILL BE CORRECTED, OR THAT THIS SITE OR THE SERVER THAT MAKES THE SITE AVAILABLE ARE FREE OF VIRUSES OR OTHER HARMFUL COMPONENTS. Stunable DOES NOT MAKE ANY WARRANTIES OR REPRESENTATIONS REGARDING THE USE OF THE MATERIALS IN THIS SITE IN TERMS OF THEIR COMPLETENESS, CORRECTNESS, ACCURACY, ADEQUACY, USEFULNESS, TIMELINESS, RELIABILITY OR OTHERWISE. THE ABOVE LIMITATIONS MAY NOT APPLY TO YOU.

LIMITATION OF LIABILITY.

IN NO EVENT SHALL Stunable BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, SPECIAL, PUNITIVE, INCIDENTAL, EXEMPLARY OR CONSEQUENTIAL, DAMAGES, OR ANY DAMAGES WHATSOEVER, EVEN IF Stunable HAS BEEN PREVIOUSLY ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES, WHETHER IN AN ACTION UNDER CONTRACT, NEGLIGENCE, OR ANY OTHER THEORY, ARISING OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH THE USE, INABILITY TO USE, OR PERFORMANCE OF THE INFORMATION, SERVICES, PRODUCTS, AND MATERIALS AVAILABLE FROM THIS SITE. THESE LIMITATIONS SHALL APPLY NOTWITHSTANDING ANY FAILURE OF ESSENTIAL PURPOSE OF ANY LIMITED REMEDY. BECAUSE SOME JURISDICTIONS DO NOT ALLOW LIMITATIONS ON HOW LONG AN IMPLIED WARRANTY LASTS, OR THE EXCLUSION OR LIMITATION OF LIABILITY FOR CONSEQUENTIAL OR INCIDENTAL DAMAGES, THE ABOVE LIMITATIONS MAY NOT APPLY TO YOU.

INDEMNIFICATION.

You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless Stunable.com, LLC, its officers, directors, employees, agents, licensors and suppliers (collectively the "Provider") from and against all losses, expenses, damages and costs, including reasonable attorneys' fees, resulting from any violation of these terms and conditions or any activity related to your Internet account (including negligent or wrongful conduct), by you or any other person accessing the Site using your Internet account.

APPLICABLE LAWS.

Your use of this Site shall be governed in all respects by the laws of the state of New York, U.S.A., without regard to choice of law provisions, and not by the 1980 U.N. Convention on contracts for the international sale of goods. You agree that jurisdiction over and venue in any legal proceeding directly or indirectly arising out of or relating to this Site (including but not limited to the purchase of Stunable products) shall be in the state or federal courts located in New York. Any cause of action or claim you may have with respect to the Site (including but not limited to the purchase of Stunable products) must be commenced within one (1) year after the claim or cause of action arises. Stunable's failure to insist upon or enforce strict performance of any provision of these terms and conditions shall not be construed as a waiver of any provision or right. Neither the course of conduct between the parties nor trade practice shall act to modify any of these terms and conditions. Stunable may assign its rights and duties under this Agreement to any party at any time without notice to you. Stunable makes no representation that materials in the Site are appropriate or available for use in other locations, and access to them from territories where their content is illegal is prohibited. Those who choose to access this Site from locations outside New York do so on their own initiative and are responsible for compliance with applicable local laws. You may not use or export the materials in violation of U.S. export laws and regulations. Any claim relating to the materials shall be governed by the internal substantive laws of the State of New York.

ARBITRATION.

By using this Site, you agree that Stunable, at its sole discretion, may require you to submit any disputes arising from the use of this Site, or these Terms and Conditions concerning or, including disputes arising from or concerning their interpretation, violation, nullity, invalidity, non-performance or termination, as well as disputes about filling gaps in this contract or its adaptation to newly arisen circumstances, to final and binding arbitration under the International Rules of Arbitration of the American Arbitration Association, by one or more arbitrators appointed in accordance with the said Rules. Notwithstanding these rules, however, such proceeding shall be governed by the laws of the state as set forth in the previous section. Any award in an arbitration initiated under this clause shall be limited to monetary damages and shall include no injunction or direction to any party other than the direction to pay a monetary amount. Further, the arbitrator(s) shall have no authority to award punitive, consequential or other damages not measured by the prevailing party's actual damages in any arbitration initiated under this section, except as may be required by statute.

GENERAL.

Stunable may revise these Terms at any time by updating this posting. You should visit this page from time to time to review the then-current Terms because they are binding on you. Certain provisions of these Terms may be superseded by expressly designated legal notices or terms located on particular pages at this Site.

fields.title: We Love Developers
fields.content:
Developers

The RESTful STUNABLE API is on the cutting edge of recent developments in technology and works directly with STUNABLE's web application code and other API technologies. The API is a key asset to the business, enabling data to be pushed, pulled and updated with other companies and mobile web services. This allows STUNABLE to both maintain and sell third party inventories while simultaneously updating the master database with recommendation information.

If you are a developer or a vendor interested in working with our API, please contact us at developers@stunable.com and we will be in touch!
